product_name: REI TSA Mini Padlock - Package of 2
long_description: Secure your luggage zippers with these small and simple REI locks the next time you travel. Locks are recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). TSA airport screeners have a secured set of keys to open Travel Sentry(R) locks, allowing access without damaging the lock. Includes two keys per lock.
short_description: Secure your luggage zippers with these small and simple REI locks the next time you travel.
